About US :
Cloudean Infotech is a technology company that administer solution and environment that puts our customers in the finest position to succeed.
We are providing premium managed services since 2016 ; powered by enterprise grade cloud infrastructure providers which can assure performance, low-latency and stability for our clients.

Our existing clients consists of E-commerce and high traffic news portal; we work as extension of their team and keeping client’s business website loading fast and secure.
We’ll craft a secure end-to-end solution that meets your current business needs and supports your future goals to drive results.

we are always stretching ourselves and striving to become the best versions of ourselves.
We perform lot of research and experiments in our free time which do assure ongoing enhancement of our services and clients business need.

We’re Pro-Active. our team take initiative and patches any possible issues on highest priority.
A team of friendly and competent support engineers – who are always willing to help. Have your doubts clarified and issues resolved in minutes, not days.

Managed WordPress
Resilient to traffic spikes

Account features :
WP Administration Interface
1-click login & bulk updates
Nginx Web Server
MariaDB [MySQL]
PHP [7.3 - 7.4]
Redis Object Caching
WAF & Malware detection
Free SSL [Let’s Encrypt]
Webmasters Tools

Automated Security Solution :
Sucuri CDN & WAF [Optional]
MailChannels [Hourly 100 Emails]

Pro-Active Support :
Daily cloud backup
Security Audits
Malware Cleanup
Patching and Updates
Technical & migration assistance
99.99% Uptime SLA

Lightweight and Decentralized by Nature
Achieve maximum uptime and avoid single point of failure by having web server, DNS and email services on independent platforms !

Managed WordPress
Harness the performance of cloud server
Focus on your business while having your infrastructure managed by our team of dedicated system administrators

AnyCast DNS
Protected from DNS-based DDoS attacks
Route visitors to the closest nameserver; reduce latency and improve performance with 29 AnyCast data centers on 6 continents

Hosted email solution
Ensuring flawless delivery of your emails
Time lost due to dealing with spam is reduced to an absolute minimum, allowing you to concentrate on your business tasks.
